price: A Mi smo i prije njih faraonov narod u iskušenje stavili, i došao im je plemeniti poslanik:
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir'ʿawna wajāahum rasūlun karīmun
